DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to validate the utility of IgE anti-cetuximab in the treatment strategy to identify patients at risk for a severe allergic reaction to cetuximab (grade 3 or 4 of the classification of NCI) and thus reduce the incidence of severe reactions.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing the Value of a Dosage of Anti-cetuximab in the Therapeutic Management of Patients With Colon Cancer or Upper Aero-digestive Tract and Candidates for Treatment With Cetuximab
